alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 7:49PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Warrick, northeastern Vanderburgh, Spencer and southeastern Gibson Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 648 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Chandler, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lynnville around 655 PM CDT. Boonville around 700 PM CDT. Folsomville around 705 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Dale and Santa Claus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 12 and 24. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 26 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
